title: New Research Finally Solves the ‘Fibromyalgia Mystery’?
subtitle: The research is real, but it is neither new nor did it substantively affect the debate about the disease’s cause.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: New research has uncovered that the true cause of fibromyalgia is an excess number of specific nerves found near a specific kind of blood vessel in the hands and feet, ending the controversy over the disease’s cause and mechanism.
